tasks.label: Start Real-Time Auction Platform
args: Write-Host '🚀 Starting Real-Time Auction Platform with WebSocket Support...' -ForegroundColor Green; cd backend; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'npm start' -WindowStyle Normal; Start-Sleep 3; cd ../frontend; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'npm run dev' -WindowStyle Normal; Write-Host '✅ Both servers starting...' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host '📡 Backend (with WebSocket): http://localhost:5000' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host '🌐 Frontend: http://localhost:3000' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host '🔗 WebSocket Server: ws://localhost:5050' -ForegroundColor Yellow
